name: test_set_2023-10-30
title: Test data package
description: Data package synthesised from actual data package for ADRIA and adjusted for testing purposes.

resources.name: spatial_data
resources.description: spatial data of cluster. Unique sites indicated by reef_siteid. Zone types under zone_type.

resources.name: coral_cover
resources.description: Initial coral cover. Matching reefs indicated by reef_siteid.

resources.name: DHWs
resources.description: Stochastic degree heating week data. Includes data for RCP 4.5.

resources.name: waves
resources.description: Stochastic wave data. Empty datasets for RCP 4.5.

resources.name: connectivity
resources.description: Connectivity data for specific days across years, grouped by year.
